about.title: About me
about.description: Hello, my name is Ícaro Xavier, a Front-end Software Engineer, passionate about technology and what I do. In February 2021, I had my first opportunity to work for a company in the field, and since then I haven't stopped, always working, studying, and improving in the area.

bio.title: Timeline
bio.06/2001: I was born in Fortaleza - Ceará, Brazil.
bio.02/2021: Started my first job in the field as an intern at RAV Tecnologia
bio.07/2021: Joined the Colono project of EMBRAPII and Polo de Inovação do IFCE.
bio.09/2021: Completed the internship at RAV Tecnologia.
bio.10/2021: Started working at Certare Engenharia & Consultoria.
bio.04/2022-1: Completed the Colono project of EMBRAPII and Polo de Inovação do IFCE.
bio.04/2022-2: Started working at Omie, within G-click.
bio.03/2023-1: Finished my collaboration at Omie to accept another opportunity.
bio.03/2023-2: Started working at Soluevo, a consulting company, working in NowCM.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.description: In my free time, you'll probably find me playing a game, taking a walk with my dog, studying the latest trends in the field, going for a drive to a new place, or watching a series, eager to find out what happens. That is if I haven't recently discovered a topic that interests me, because I only stop when I've devoured everything.

madeireira-geovane.description: A lead generation landing page developed entirely by me as a Freelancer job.

better-date-functions.description: My first JavaScript library to assist in the development of systems that manipulate dates, providing various ready-made functions to obtain details about days, months, and years.

reminder-task-manager.description: My first React project, which was the challenge I received to secure my internship. It's a Kanban-like application with synchronized drag and drop using Firebase and authentication as well. It was quite challenging, but it proved to me that with enough research, we can achieve anything.

moRANGO.description: This project is a Flutter application that aims to search for recipes using ingredients that you already have at home or plan to buy. I developed it with my college colleagues as part of an Object-Oriented Programming course project.

teste-omie.description: This was the project I developed for the Omie selection process, in which I was approved. I used the Angular framework for the front-end and developed a back-end with Spring Boot (JAVA).

portfolio.description: This is my portfolio, developed with Next.js and TailwindCSS, with the aim of showcasing some of my work and skills.
